name: The Light Cave Myth
description:
CLICK FULL SCREEN BUTTON TO PLAY

The Light Cave Myth is a game that tells the story of a boy who decided to see beyond the shadows. For that he had to leave the cave. But it is not possible to live in the light knowing that your peers are seeing a lie? The boy then decides to return to the cave and guide his friends to the exit.

Controls
Walk by PRESSING the up, down, left and right arrows
HOLD SPACE when the light is illuminated the exit and your friend.

This game was made by https://twitter.com/KaelGameDev  in the week of delivering his thesis and Rafael Semino, who works 18 hours a day during the week
